Why Web Development?

Web Development is currently in demand as Web 3.0 is booming So it would be great to learn web development in the current Decade

Road Map of Web3

  • Html5

    Html5 is the markup for your websites.

  • CSS3

    Css3 is responsible for the desigining of the web i.e.Most of the styling on the web is done using CSS3.

  • JavaScript

    JavaScript is important for web3 as js is crucial when programmers want to interact with on-chain components such as smart contracts.

  • React

    It's used for handling the view layer for web and mobile apps. React also allows us to create reusable UI components.

  • Solidity

    Solidity is used to create smart contracts for fungible tokens and non-fungible tokens. Different standards are used to build non-fungible tokens and fungible tokens in the Ethereum ecosystem.

  • Hardhat

    Hardhat is a development environment to compile, deploy, test, and debug your Ethereum software.

  • IPFS

    By integrating IPFS into browsers, it is possible for Web3 infrastructure to interact with browsers seamlessly.

  • WEB3.Js

    Web3. js is an important part of the blockchain and smart contract ecosystem, allowing dApps to interact with blockchain networks.
